attributes.action: dvla 2 recognise libre sensors as a way of checking your blood for Hgv licence
attributes.background: I would like the government to make the libre sensors a way you can show the dvla your bloods etc for medical aswell as the finger pricks as said finger pricking doesn’t work for all of us with the different environment type jobs with have which gives a risk to infections

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595580
